original_text: God wants you to do only what is good. Then silly people will not be able to say bad things against you. Those people do not really know what is true. God wants you to do only what is good. Then silly people will not be able to say bad things against you. Those people do not really know what is true. God wants you to do only what is good. Then silly people will not be able to say bad things against you. Those people do not really know what is true.
korean_text: 곧 선행으로 어리석은 사람들의 무식한 말을 막으시는 것이라

sentences.original_text: God wants you to do only what is good.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신이 오직 선한 것만 행하기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: Then silly people will not be able to say bad things against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 어리석은 사람들이 당신을 향해 나쁜 말을 할 수 없을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Those people do not really know what is true.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 진정으로 무엇이 참된지 알지 못합니다.

sentences.original_text: God wants you to do only what is good.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신이 오직 선한 것만 행하기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: Then silly people will not be able to say bad things against you.
